results.name: a(n) = 1 if n and sigma(n) are relatively prime, 0 otherwise, where sigma(n) = sum of divisors of n, A000203; Characteristic function of A014567.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
formula: a(n) = 1 if gcd(n, sigma(n)) [= A009194(n)] is 1, 0 otherwise.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 29 2019
